verses.verse: But now they that are <S%H6810>younger<s%> than I have me in <S%H7832>derision<s%>, Whose <S%H1>fathers<s%> I <S%H3988>disdained<s%> to <S%H7896>set<s%> with the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> of my <S%H6629>flock<s%>.
Yea <S%H3581><s%>, the strength of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, <S%H4100>whereto<s%> should it profit <S%H3624>me<s%>? Men in whom ripe age is <S%H6>perished<s%>.

They are <S%H1565>gaunt<s%> with <S%H2639>want<s%> and <S%H3720>famine<s%>; They <S%H6207>gnaw<s%> the dry <S%H6723>ground<s%>, in the <S%H570>gloom<s%> of <S%H4875>wasteness<s%> and <S%H7722>desolation<s%>.
They <S%H6998>pluck<s%> <S%H4408>salt-wort<s%> by the <S%H7880>bushes<s%>; And the <S%H8328>roots<s%> of the <S%H7574>broom<s%> are their <S%H3899>food<s%>.
They are driven <S%H1644>forth<s%> from the <S%H1460>midst<s%> of <S%H7321>men<s%>; They cry after them as after a <S%H1590>thief<s%>;
So that they <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H6178>frightful<s%> <S%H5158>valleys<s%>, In <S%H2356>holes<s%> of the <S%H6083>earth<s%> and of the <S%H3710>rocks<s%>.
Among the <S%H7880>bushes<s%> they <S%H5101>bray<s%>; Under the <S%H2738>nettles<s%> they are gathered <S%H5596>together<s%>.
They are <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5036>fools<s%>, <S%H1121>yea<s%>, children of base <S%H8034>men<s%>; They were <S%H5217>scourged<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>.
And now I am become their <S%H5058>song<s%>, <S%H4405>Yea<s%>, I am a byword unto them.
They <S%H8581>abhor<s%> <S%H7368>me<s%>, they stand aloof from <S%H2820>me<s%>, And spare not to <S%H7536>spit<s%> in my <S%H6440>face<s%>.
For he hath <S%H6605>loosed<s%> his <S%H3499>cord<s%>, and <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> <S%H7971>me<s%>; And they have cast off the <S%H7448>bridle<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>.

Upon my <S%H3225>right<s%> hand <S%H6965>rise<s%> the <S%H6526>rabble<s%>; They thrust <S%H7971>aside<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%>, And they cast <S%H5549>up<s%> against me their <S%H734>ways<s%> of <S%H343>destruction<s%>.
They <S%H5420>mar<s%> my <S%H5410>path<s%>, They set <S%H3276>forward<s%> my <S%H1942>calamity<s%>, Even men that have no <S%H5826>helper<s%>.
As through a <S%H7342>wide<s%> <S%H6556>breach<s%> they <S%H857>come<s%>: In the <S%H8478>midst<s%> of the <S%H7722>ruin<s%> they roll themselves upon <S%H1556>me<s%>.

Terrors <S%H1091><s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> upon <S%H7291>me<s%>; They chase mine <S%H5082>honor<s%> as the <S%H7307>wind<s%>; And my <S%H3444>welfare<s%> is passed <S%H5674>away<s%> as a <S%H5645>cloud<s%>.
And now my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is poured <S%H8210>out<s%> within <S%H3117>me<s%>; Days of <S%H6040>affliction<s%> have taken hold upon <S%H270>me<s%>.
In the night <S%H3915>season<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H5365>pierced<s%> in <S%H6207>me<s%>, And the pains that gnaw me take no <S%H7901>rest<s%>.
By <S%H7230>God<s%>'s great <S%H3581>force<s%> is my <S%H3830>garment<s%> <S%H2664>disfigured<s%>; It bindeth me <S%H247>about<s%> as the <S%H6310>collar<s%> of my <S%H3801>coat<s%>.
He hath <S%H3384>cast<s%> me into the <S%H2563>mire<s%>, And I am become <S%H4911>like<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> and <S%H665>ashes<s%>.
I <S%H7768>cry<s%> unto <S%H6030>thee<s%>, and thou dost not answer <S%H5975>me<s%>: I stand up, and thou gazest at <S%H995>me<s%>.
Thou art <S%H2015>turned<s%> to be <S%H393>cruel<s%> to <S%H6108>me<s%>; With the might of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> thou persecutest <S%H7852>me<s%>.
Thou liftest me <S%H5375>up<s%> to the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, thou causest me to <S%H7392>ride<s%> upon <S%H4127>it<s%>; And thou dissolvest me in the <S%H8454>storm<s%>.
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou wilt <S%H7725>bring<s%> me to <S%H4194>death<s%>, And to the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4150>appointed<s%> for all <S%H2416>living<s%>.
Howbeit doth not one stretch <S%H7971>out<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> in his <S%H1164>fall<s%>? Or in his <S%H6365>calamity<s%> therefore cry for <S%H7769>help<s%>?
Did not I <S%H1058>weep<s%> for him that was in <S%H7186>trouble<s%>? Was not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5701>grieved<s%> for the <S%H34>needy<s%>?
When I <S%H6960>looked<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>, then <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>; And when I <S%H3176>waited<s%> for <S%H216>light<s%>, there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H652>darkness<s%>.
My <S%H4578>heart<s%> is <S%H7570>troubled<s%>, and <S%H1826>resteth<s%> <S%H3117>not<s%>; Days of <S%H6040>affliction<s%> are come upon <S%H6923>me<s%>.
I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> without the <S%H2535>sun<s%>: I stand <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>, and cry for <S%H7768>help<s%>.
I am a <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H8577>jackals<s%>, And a <S%H7453>companion<s%> to <S%H1323>ostriches<s%>.
My <S%H5785>skin<s%> is <S%H7835>black<s%>, and falleth from <S%H6106>me<s%>, And my bones are <S%H2787>burned<s%> with <S%H2721>heat<s%>.
Therefore is my <S%H3658>harp<s%> turned to <S%H60>mourning<s%>, And my <S%H5748>pipe<s%> into the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that <S%H1058>weep<s%>.
